title: Agricultural Practices- Soil preparation and Transplantation.

subtasks: Plowing the soil using a wooden plow or tractor-mounted leveling tool
Leveling the soil using a putler or iron plow attached to a tractor
Cultivating paddy using the direct seeding method
Selecting and preparing high-quality seeds through germination tests and treatments
Uprooting healthy seedlings with four to five leaves from the nursery plot
Carefully bundling and transporting seedlings using baskets to the transplantation area
Transplanting seedlings into the field at proper distances for optimal yield
Employing a paddy planter for efficient transplantation of seedlings
Demonstrating the importance of proper seedling spacing in crop yield

tasks.task: Conducting seed tests and appreciating agricultural labor
subtasks: Performing germination tests on seeds by soaking them in water and counting healthy sprouts
Appreciating the skill of agricultural workers in seed selection and transplantation
Describing the selection of appropriate seeds for different crops
Explaining the steps involved in preparing seedbeds and direct seeding
Preparing diagrams or illustrations of agricultural tools and practices

tasks.task: Transplanting seedlings in a rice field
Preparing agricultural tools (plowing with wooden plow/tractor, leveling with putler)
subtasks: Operating a wooden plow manually
Using a tractor and putler for leveling
Cultivating paddy using direct seeding method
Selecting quality seeds, conducting germination tests
Uprooting seedlings, careful handling
Transplanting seedlings into fields at proper distances
Using a paddy planter for efficient planting.
Using a wooden plow to plow the field manually
Leveling the field with a putler attached to a tractor
Selecting and preparing high-quality seeds
Germinating seeds using a test
Uprooting seedlings with four to five leaves
Bundling and transporting seedlings

Planting the seedlings in rows at proper distances using a paddy planter (or manually if needed? But the transcript mentions "paddy planter" as a tool. If they're operating the planter, that's a task, but probably different.)
